'''''Ancient Sea Adventurer''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Rhapsodia in the Ancient Sea]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete twenty-four [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Nostoi Region]] and [[Sea of Bygone Eras]].
